titleStmt.title: The ordinance and edict, vppon the fact of the execution of both the religions statuted by the bailieses, schepens, of both the benches, and both the wardens of the citie of Ghaunt, by aduisement of my Lord, the Prince of Orange, and sight of the three members of the same citie of Ghaunt. Published the 27. day of December. 1578. Translated out of Dutch.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Dawson, dwelling at the three Cranes in the Vinetree,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the three Cranes in the Vinetree
